headline: Apple Hardware Executive Says iPhone Maker Plans To Use AI For Speeding Up Custom Chip Design: 'High Potential In Getting More Design Work In Less Time'
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is reportedly looking to harness the power of generative artificial intelligence to accelerate the development of the custom chips that power its devices, according to senior executive Johny Srouji. What Happened: During a speech in Belgium last month, Apple's senior vice president of hardware technologies, Srouji, said the company is exploring generative AI to streamline chip design, calling it a major productivity opportunity, reported Reuters on Wednesday. "Generative

headline: 4 Top Robotics Stocks to Watch in the Second Half of 2025
summary: Robotics is poised for robust growth in the second half of 2025. Watch AMD, TSLA, CDNS and SERV that are poised to dominate the market.
